article: Look at the photo. It's my family. The old man and the old woman are my  _  . This is my father. He is next to his brother, my  _  . This woman is my mother. She is my English teacher. You can  _  three children in the photo. These two girls are my  _  The girl in a red dress is Nancy  _  the girl in a yellow dress is Susan. Do you know the boy? Yes, it's me. My grandparents are in the USA. I am in Beijing  _  my parents now. My father is  _  teacher. He works in Beijing No.28 Middle School. He often has milk  _  breakfast. And he likes to eat  bread  . My mother often  _  some eggs and a glass of milk. I have a big family.
